note:
Somewhat amusingly, I suffer from multiple social media personalities. Eli Rabett is reasonably (or not) well known for commenting on climate science and policy issues .

On the other hand, Josh Halpern has become deeply involved in Open Textbooks and OER as part of LibreTexts.

Finally there are people Eli and Josh have met along the way who might want to follow.

So here at ScienceMastedon we attempt a personality meld. Will it work? Who knows but let's try, it could be amusing.
